title: Cant invite friend to ranked bug
body: So i havent done my placements and was gold 5 last season, my brother has done his placements, is gold 4 and i can join him in a ranked lobby, i can invite my other friend who is bronze 3 to a ranked game however he doesnt get the invite and when i try and accept his invite, an error message appears which i will link in this thread with gyazo. We can join a normal lobby however. Is this a bug or intended https://gyazo.com/8e84b4d6ae298c9014cb06ac2e1005f5

replies.body: I can't say for sure until we get more info on who's being invited and the type of queue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this individually and figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you!
